game.name: PAYDAY 2: Black Cat Heist
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 페이데이 갱이 바다에 나가 금비회에게 가장 뼈아픈 곳에 한 방 선사하려고 합니다. 녀석들의 선상 카지노 요새에 말이죠.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Payday Gang goes out to sea to strike a blow at the Golden Dagger Triad where it’ll hurt them the most, their floating casino fortress.
